abstract: Asked why he believed Mr. de Blasio would make New York City less safe, Mr. Lhota never quite answered the question, but he did assert that he himself had played a role in 1994 in the creation of CompStat, the Police Department’s vaunted data-based system for responding quickly to crime and holding precinct commanders accountable for the results.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
